sources.title: Devil Girl from Mars
sources.description: Title: Devil Girl from Mars Summary: An uptight, leather-clad female alien, armed with a ray gun and accompanied by a menacing robot, comes to Earth to collect Earth's men as breeding stock. Directed by: David MacDonald Actors: Hugh McDermott, Hazel Court, Peter Reynolds Production Company: Danziger Productions Ltd. Release Date: 27 April 1955 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.80 : 1 In a Scottish inn, the owners, employees and guests are reunited in the bar. Our of the blue, a flying saucer lands nearby and a woman dressed in black leather like a dominatrix with a cape arrives in the bar armed with a ray-gun. She explains that she is Nyah from Mars, and she was heading to London. However her spacecraft collided with an airplane and was damaged; therefore she had to land to repair the saucer. She also explains that she is looking for men to breed her female race since the male population is dying after warfare between males and females and they need offspring. Nyah has the robot Chani to help her to capture men, but she wants that one of the men volunteers to go with her to Mars. Who might be the volunteer?

sources.title: Devil Girl From Mars ( 1954)
sources.description: From IMDb: An uptight, leather-clad female alien, armed with a ray gun and accompanied by a menacing robot, comes to Earth to collect Earth's men as breeding stock. Director: David MacDonald Screenplay: James Eastwood Stars: Hugh McDermott, Hazel Court, Peter Reynolds, Adrienne Corri, Joseph Tomelty, John Laurie, Sophie Stewart

sources.title: Devil Girl from Mars (restored, colorized) (1954, sci-fi, imdb score: 4.9)
sources.description: Devil Girl from Mars is a 1954 British second feature black-and-white science fiction film , produced by the Danziger Brothers , directed by David MacDonald and starring Patricia Laffan , Hugh McDermott , Hazel Court , Peter Reynolds , and Adrienne Corri . It was released by British Lion , and released in the United States the following year. A female alien is sent from Mars to acquire human males to replace their declining male population. When negotiation, then intimidation, fails she must use force to obtain co-operation from a remote Scottish village where she has landed her crippled flying saucer.

sources.title: Devil Girl From Mars 1954 colorized
sources.description: In a Scottish inn, staff and guests (Hugh McDermott, Hazel Court, Peter Reynolds, Adrienne Corri) are gathered in the bar when a flying saucer lands nearby and a woman (Patricia Laffan) dressed in black leather and a cape arrives, armed with a ray-gun. She explains that she is Nyah from Mars, and she was heading to London to find menÂ  since the male population of Mars is dying. However her spacecraft collided with an airplane and was damaged, so she had to land for repairs. Nyah has brought a robot in her ship to help capture men, but she wants one of the locals to volunteer to come with her. I colorized this using AI software that doesn't always get the colors right, but I think it looks fairly natural. Hopefully a more professional job will be done someday.

metadata.Plot: In a Scottish inn, the owners, employees and guests are reunited in the bar. Out of the blue, a flying saucer lands nearby and a woman dressed in black leather like a dominatrix with a cape arrives in the bar armed with a ray-gun. She explains that she is Nyah from Mars, and she was heading to London. However her spacecraft collided with an airplane and was damaged; therefore she had to land to repair the saucer. She also explains that she is looking for men to breed her female race since the male population is dying after warfare between males and females and they need offspring. Nyah has the robot Chani to help her to capture men, but she wants that one of the men volunteers to go with her to Mars. Who might be the volunteer?
